ing: 1 1/2 teaspoons minced garlic, or to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 (15 ounce) can light red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup minced red onion, or to taste
1 pinch ground sumac, or to taste (optional)
des: "I crave this salad often, and I feel healthier after eating it! Best served at room temperature. Refrigerate leftovers."
ins: Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and garlic together in a bowl; season with salt and pepper. Add parsley, kidney beans,  garbanzo beans, and onion; toss to coat. Sprinkle sumac over salad; season with salt and pepper.
